bug_report.ID: Keep it brief and use correct terms
bug_report.Description: If you feel the name is not sufficient, explain the bug in a few words
bug_report.Environment: Depending on your browser, operating system, zoom level and screen size, websites may behave differently from one environment to another
bug_report.Console: By collecting the console logs your developers will find it a lot easier to reproduce and resolve any bug
bug_report.Source: Make it easy for your developers spot the problem by including the URL of the page where you found the bug
bug_report.Visual: A picture is worth a thousand words
bug_report.Steps: Make sure to describe, with as much detail as possible, the steps you took before you encountered the bug
bug_report.Expected: Explain what results you expected - be as specific as possible
